about_the_game:
There is a fireworks event in the evening and your friend knows just the right place to watch it. All you have to do is get there through this perfectly normal park. Just follow the arrows and you'll reach your destination. Eventually. How hard can that be? And what number of acorns is enough acorns?

In this demo version of the game, you can explore the first biome and meet the first boss. After defeating the boss you will be returned to the start of the game.

  • Classic platformer experience
  • Simple controls that you can change at any point in game
  • Customize color rendering and reduce motion

A couple tips before you go
  • Look around! This is no ordinary park. There might be hidden secrets...
  • Practice makes perfect. You can do it!

legal_notice:
Music by:
* 8-Bit Metroidvania Music Pack by RyanAvx.
* Three Red Hearts by Abstraction.
* ChipSet - Chiptune Music Loops by Ratticus Vile.
* Hero's Calling by Joel Francis Burford.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Xp or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.66
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Dolby Surround
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Dolby Surround

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
